All the files contained in this project are placed under
public domain, except those copied from external sources
that were not already at public domain.

They are:
- serpent_bitslice_sbox.h
- tests/reference/rc4.c
- tests/test_vectors/hc-128_test_vec.txt
- tests/test_vectors/rabbit_test_vec.txt
- tests/test_vectors/salsa20-12_test_vec.txt
- tests/test_vectors/salsa20-20_test_vec.txt
- tests/test_vectors/salsa20-8_test_vec.txt
- tests/test_vectors/sosemanuk_test_vec.txt
